channel.title: Windows 7 Compiler error
channel.description:
My compiler reads as follows: [code]@echo off title Building Files javac -d ./Class/ Java/*.java Java/sign/*.java pause[/code]
It gives me the error: Javac is not recognized as an external or internal command..
